name: NameTest
description: Unit tests for various name generation functionalities provided by the Name class.

test_cases.name: testName
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a full name matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testNameWithMiddle
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a name with a middle name matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testNameWithMiddleDoesNotHaveRepeatedName
test_cases.description: Tests that the generated name with a middle name does not have repeated names.

test_cases.name: testFullName
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a full name matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testFullNameArabic
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a full name in Arabic matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testFirstName
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a first name matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testFemaleFirstName
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a female first name matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testMaleFirstName
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a male first name matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testLastName
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a last name matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a name prefix matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testSuffix
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a name suffix matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: testTitle
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a title matching a specific pattern.

test_cases.name: test
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a name in Indonesian.
